events.name: Why Capitalism always wins
events.description: It's quite simple, actually. Humans act on incentives (all living things do, but we only care about human ones), and Capitalism is a system that align those perfectly.

events.name: The Simplest Way to Build Dark Mode With React and CSS
events.description: We all love dark mode. This post shows how to implement a simple solution to support it in a React app.
